nodes.text: A fish species known as sez was native to the oceans of the Mid Rim planet Bothawui. The species' name was used as a family name by the Bothans, a sentient species native to Bothawui. Mak Sezala, a Bothan senator serving the New Republic during the invasion of the extra-galactic Yuuzhan Vong, had "sez" as part of his surname, along with the clan suffix "ala."

The species known as sez was first mentioned in the Galactic Campaign Guide, a 2003 sourcebook written by Peter Schweighofer and J.D. Wiker for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game. The plural form of the species name and its level of sentience were not mentioned in the book, which mentioned the species in a table of Bothan family names.
